00100 typedef enum {
00101         ENCODING_UNSET,
00102         ENCODING_REL_URI, /* for coding a rel-uri (/with space/and%percent) nicely as part of an href */
00103         ENCODING_REL_URI_PART, /* same as ENC_REL_URL plus encoding "/" as "%2F" */
00104         ENCODING_HTML,    /* "&" becomes "&amp;" and so on */
00105         ENCODING_MINIMAL_XML, /* minimal encoding for xml */
00106         ENCODING_HEX      /* encode string as hex */
00107 } buffer_encoding_t;

00134 #define BUF_STR(x) x->ptr
00135 #define BUF_STR_LEN(x) (x->used ? x->used - 1 : 0)
00136 
00137 /* used on solaris as their vprintf() hates NULL for %s */
00138 #define SAFE_BUF_STR(x) x && x->ptr ? x->ptr : "(null)" 
00139 
00140 #define BUFFER_APPEND_STRING_CONST(x, y) \
00141         buffer_append_string_len(x, y, sizeof(y) - 1)
00142 
00143 #define BUFFER_COPY_STRING_CONST(x, y) \
00144         buffer_copy_string_len(x, y, sizeof(y) - 1)
00145 
00146 #define CONST_STR_LEN(x) x, x ? sizeof(x) - 1 : 0
00147 #define CONST_BUF_LEN(x) BUF_STR(x), x->used ? x->used - 1 : 0
